body.name: Dockers Men's Bronson Oxford
features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported
Cushioned EVA footbed for exceptional comfort
body.description: Add a touch of rugged style to your look with these Dockers oxfords. The synthetic uppers and classic oxford design are paired perfectly with a laid-on welt and lightweight, treaded outsole to bring your unique style to any dress-casual look. Whether you’re pairing these men’s shoes with jeans, khakis, or slacks you’ll know that your look is refined and polished, while still casual and rugged. Plus, the extra comfortable footbed and shock-absorbing outsole will keep your feet relaxed and supported all day long. These dress shoes are ideal for keeping your look elevated doesn’t without sacrificing your personal style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress/Causal shoe
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dockers Men's Bronson Rugged Casual Oxford Shoe, and I have been quite pleased with my purchase. These shoes strike a good balance between style and durability, making them suitable for various casual occasions.First and foremost, the design of the Bronson shoe is a standout feature. It has a classic oxford silhouette with a rugged twist, giving it a versatile and timeless look. The rich leather upper adds a touch of sophistication, while the subtle stitching and detailing provide a hint of ruggedness. These shoes can easily be dressed up or down, making them suitable for both formal and casual events.When it comes to comfort, the Bronson shoe delivers. The cushioned insole provides ample support and helps reduce fatigue during long periods of wear. I found the shoe to have a good amount of arch support, which is essential for all-day comfort. The lace-up closure allows for a customized fit, ensuring that the shoe stays snugly in place.Durability is another notable aspect of these shoes. The leather upper is sturdy and shows minimal signs of wear even after extended use. The rubber outsole offers excellent traction, providing stability on different surfaces. I have worn these shoes in various weather conditions, and they have held up well, maintaining their structural integrity.One minor downside I encountered was that the break-in period for these shoes was slightly longer than expected. Initially, they felt a bit stiff and required some time to mold to the shape of my feet. However, after a few wears, they became more comfortable, and I no longer experienced any discomfort.In terms of sizing, the shoes fit true to size for me.Overall, the Dockers Men's Bronson Rugged Casual Oxford Shoe offers a winning combination of style, comfort, and durability. Whether you're dressing up for a semi-formal occasion or simply want a reliable and versatile shoe for everyday wear, these shoes are a solid choice. Despite the initial break-in period, they have proven to be comfortable and reliable over time. I would recommend them to anyone in search of a well-crafted and stylish casual oxford shoe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, Versatility, and Affordable Style
reviews.reviewText: Alright, fellas, let me tell you about these Dockers Men's Bronson Rugged Casual Oxford Shoes. I've been rocking them for a while now, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Here's the lowdown from a man's perspective.First things first, these shoes are comfortable as can be. Seriously, it's like walking on a cloud. The cushioned insole and padded collar make them a dream to wear, even for long hours. Whether I'm strolling around the office or hitting the town for a night out, my feet stay cozy and happy in these bad boys.Now, here's what I love most about these shoes—they are versatile as heck. I can easily dress them up or down, depending on the occasion. They pair perfectly with a sharp pair of jeans for a casual yet put-together look. But guess what? These babies can also handle dress pants like a boss. They effortlessly transition from a casual day at work to a fancy dinner without skipping a beat.Let's talk about the style factor. These oxford shoes have serious class. The rugged design gives them a masculine and timeless appeal. The craftsmanship is top-notch, and the attention to detail is evident. But here's the kicker—these shoes look way more expensive than they actually are. Seriously, people think I've spent a fortune on them. It's like my little style secret that doesn't break the bank.Durability-wise, these shoes hold up like champs. The quality materials and sturdy construction give them that rugged edge while ensuring they can handle whatever I throw at them. Rain, mud, you name it—they can take it and still look sharp. Plus, they're easy to clean and maintain, which is a major plus for a low-maintenance guy like me.All in all, the Dockers Men's Bronson Rugged Casual Oxford Shoes are a winner in my book. They combine comfort, versatility, and a stylish aesthetic that punches above its weight. Whether I'm going for a laid-back vibe or a dressier look, these shoes have my back. Trust me, you won't regret adding a pair to your shoe collection. They're a solid investment that will have you strutting with confidence while keeping your feet happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really like the look and how well these shoes fit. They’re a little tough on the ankles at first but nothing a little breaking won’t fix. Thinking about getting another pair but in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was leery about buying this online, but I am extremely happy with the product. True to size and a nice looking shoe.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised, comfortable and holding up well
reviews.reviewText: My son wears dressier shoes for gigs and has no complaints with these shoes. They fit well and look good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Confortable and true fit .I ordered size 9 and my foot size is 8.5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, great look, BROKE after a few months of light wear!
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for I guess. I’ve worn these shoes in my office for a couple months and they broke just by walking around on the carpets. They broke in a really strange way, I’ve never seen before in a shoe. It’s because the shoes are not constructed the way a high-quality shoe would be constructed. There’s sort of glued together, and the stress points are different from a normal shoe. So as the shoe breaks in, instead of just flexing, apparently it just cracked in the middle of the shoe, at the top of the heel. As a result of the crack, the heel kind of deflated like a balloon, and that’s it I walk around now it makes a whooshing sound. I can wear them home from work, thankfully, but they’re going straight to the garbage. Very strange see photo. It’s too bad because otherwise, it’s a pretty good shoe. I know the shoes are not meant to be repaired, they’re kind of wear them for a year and then throw them away, but I thought I’d get more than just a couple months out of them, wearing them around on office carpets. Buyer beware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inaccurate size guide vs Dockers official website
reviews.reviewText: Lovely and beautiful good looking shoes, just got it way too big on size. Out of curiosity after I receive them unfortunately I checked on dockers' official website size guide and compare to Amazons' one size means an inch difference. Product is good but size charts must be properly updated.
